name: The Bunnyman (itch)
description:
Hello, this is a game i made with my friend Dan, for a university game jam, the theme was urban legends so we decided to make this based on the bunnyman legend. the aim of the game is to collect 6 polaroids from around the map whilst being chased by the bunnyman. to avoid being caught, take refuge in the light, stand beneath the multiple lamps to get away from the bunnyman.

This is my first horror game and it was made in about 3 days so take it easy on me XD.

-I did most of the 3d modelling and texturing for the game, like the bunnyman himself as well as some simple programming.

-Dan was in charge of the map, he created the terrain and set up the scene, as well as doing the research and resource gathering.
